snippet: b"Germany's leading economic institutes on Thursday slashed their 2019 growth forecast for Europe's biggest economy to 0.8 percent from their previous prediction of 1.9 percent but warned growth could be much lower still if there is a no-deal Brexit..."

headline: b'G20 Agrees on Need for Timely Action as Global Economic Risks Rise'
snippet: b"The Group of 20 industrialized nations agreed on the need to take timely policy action to ensure that heightening risks do not prolong a global economic slowdown, Japan's central bank governor said on Friday."

headline: b"Weak Trade Data Casts Doubt on Germany's Economic Strength"
snippet: b"German exports and imports both fell more than expected in February, data showed on Monday, in the latest sign that Europe's largest economy is likely to post meagre growth in the first quarter amid increased headwinds from abroad."

headline: b'UK Headed for Downturn as Brexit Worries Hammer Services'
snippet: b"Britain's economy looks likely to shrink over the coming months, after Brexit worries caused the dominant services sector to contract for the first time in nearly three years, a survey showed on Wednesday."

headline: b'Severe Global Downturn Would Need Coordinated Stimulus-IMF Economist'

headline: b"'Upswing at an End' as German Institutes Slash Growth Forecast"
snippet: b"Germany's leading economic institutes slashed their forecasts for 2019 growth by more than half on Thursday and warned that the economy - Europe's largest - could slow much more if Britain quits the European Union without an agreement."

headline: b'Growth Stumbling but Central Bank Arsenals Are Near-Empty'
snippet: b"Global economic growth is slowing, according to the International Monetary Fund, policymakers and hundreds of economists polled by Reuters - but that downturn is coming at a time when central banks' arsenals are running on empty."

headline: b'German Industrial Output Rises on Construction Surge'
snippet: b"German industrial output rose by 0.7 percent in February as mild weather helped a surge in construction activity but manufacturing production dipped, doing little to boost spirits in Europe's largest economy after a run of negative news."

headline: b"Customs Union With EU Wouldn't Work for Britain, Foreign Minister Hunt Says"
snippet: b"A customs union with the European Union would not work for Britain's economy if it restricted its ability to influence trade policy and strike deals independently, foreign minister Jeremy Hunt said on Wednesday."

headline: b"Erdogan's Election Setback Dents Hopes for Big Reforms in Turkey"
snippet: b"President Tayyip Erdogan's losses in local elections have dented investors' hopes that Turkey will adopt painful reforms they say are needed to stabilize the economy as he moves to shore up his political base."
